column5: Congrats Art!  Oh and thanks for the work all the mods have put in. Wouldn't have this great community if it weren't for you guys!
It's been an hour or so since I posted in this topic and I'm not banned or on mod-q yet.  Thanks again Art!
They picked Art because, he,s to far away for a hosstil banned member to get him.  Guess i,ll have to post more meal dinners now.
VERY GOOD
Very funny Art.I cant believe I had to call Spiel to get me unbanned.You may want to let TJ and Roy off of mod Q. Joe
Sweet   always nice to have someone new in parliment....lol cheers  thx for  the wicked support we have already. couldn't imagine the board getting even better

Be the first to congratulate the newest member of the administrative team in our community. WE would have been hard pressed to find a better candidate. Art, AKA aplumma joined us today. He ain't no newbie by any stretch of the imagination. Art has been here for years and knows his way around. I'm sure that this is a heck of a good move for our community and we're very happy that he's with us. Take a bow, Art and welcome, my friend.  (Now excuse me, I have to go fix what he busted already.  )
Darn...overlooked again  hopefully next time!!  Congrats Art!!

Congrates Art 1st Order of bizness - switch the skin over to the Christmas theme 2nd order of bizness - the magical red button labelled "do not touch this button".....go ahead an push it ....i double dog dare ya
Can't let the inmates run the asylum, good move.
Welcome Art.
Great choice. Art is talented and fair. He will be a very good Moderator.
A well deserving addition to the mod squad  Looking forward to being edited by you Art  First order of business, ban that Joe guy, he's trouble  Joey
Awesome Art    I promise I won't make you listen to this kind of music.... cross my heart Leechman
Now I know how the goats feel.
I'm being surrounded by mods  Marty to the West, Art to the South. everyone else to the North.  I only have East left as my escape route.   The walls are closing in on me.  Congrats Art.
Wow,congrats  I am sure after all his Ceasar Milan classes,he will make this pack Calm and Submissive with No affection
Congrats Art.
I'm almost East of you Rich. You and Patsy stop in for supper on the way through.
good on you Art. I'm sure someone will have ya flushin them in no time  Merry Christmas
Does that mean no more "Yankee" jokes will be permitted?
I think he needs a trial run...

Thanks to all I am very happy to be able to help out around here. I feel a great debt to this wonderful website it contains some of my best friends and mentors and it just seems natural to want to give back to all of you. I don't foresee any changes around here. The red button has lots of fail safes built into it and as soon as Roy gets over the fact I accidently   deleted his account we will be fine. Just a reminder If anyone has a question or an issue with something I have done or any of the Mods feel free to P.M. the Mod who took the action.   Art
The Mod Squad
Oh great...more fun police..  Congrats Art and the OFC board.
Congrats Art!
Good on ya Art ... but jeeze I thought you already were a mod ... anyhow I guess thats it for the plumber jokes  Have a wonderful Christmas bud !
Congratz Art!!!  Be careful with all those buttons in there lol
Good for you Art. Are you going to be a kinder,gentler type of mod??  Just kidding I lub all of our mods!!!
congrat's Art
